content: {"name": "The Perry Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serving residents of 48217, 48218, 48229, 48146, 48122, 48209, and 48126\nEnter through the door at the rear of the building\nhttps://perryoutreach.org/services/", "email": "", "url": "https://perryoutreach.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "12047 Miami Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Detroit", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48217", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.2716831, "longitude": -83.1516583}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 749-7324", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
